partner_skill_description: While in team, increases attack power of Neutral Pals. Sometimes drops Wool when assigned to Ranch.

active_skills.name: Air Cannon
active_skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

active_skills.name: Sand Blast
active_skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

active_skills.name: Spark Blast
active_skills.description: The user releases a lightning ball that expands outward in a forward, circular pattern.

active_skills.name: Power Shot
active_skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

active_skills.name: Shockwave
active_skills.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

active_skills.name: Power Bomb
active_skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

active_skills.name: Lightning Bolt
active_skills.description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.

pal_description:
When too relaxed, its reaction time drastically declines. Even if it were sliced from head to tail,
it probably wouldn't even realize that it should be dead until the next morning.
partner_skill_description: While in team, increases attack power of Ground Pals.

pal_description:
When it starts crying, this Pal produces magma in place of tears. The magma that pours out is absorbed back into its body, causing it to get hotter and hotter.
The more it cries, the stronger it becomes.
partner_skill_description: Sometimes produces Flame Organ when assigned to Ranch.

active_skills.name: Ignis Blast
active_skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

active_skills.name: Spirit Fire
active_skills.description:
Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance,
generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

active_skills.name: Flare Arrow
active_skills.description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

active_skills.name: Spirit Flame
active_skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

active_skills.name: Flare Storm
active_skills.description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

active_skills.name: Ignis Rage
active_skills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

active_skills.name: Fire Ball
active_skills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

pal_description:
Wild Rooby surprisingly never get sick. Eating one piece of charcoal a day, made by burning a branch,
is the secret to its eternal health.
